data.title: North of Mount Pleasant, Awendaw, SC

data.text:
About us

Over three decades of southern home cooking

See Wee has been a neighborhood staple since 1993, focusing on Southern home cooking made with love. The building was originally a general store, built in the 1920s, and the vibe and ambiance is definitely here! Everything is locally sourced to give back to the community. Come grab some Simply Good Food, and check out the "Events" page for dates when we have live music on our beautiful patio. The only days we close are Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas!

Read more about us

We want to

hear from you!

Taking the next step in your career? We would love to hear from you. Please browse our open positions.

Jobs

Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Mark F:

The original. The best. When it was out in L.A. (Lower Awendaw) it was a short drive. Now it's just outside Mt Pleasant and easy to get to. We go there and sometimes just eat the sides. Get their fried flounder. It's the best this side of the Cooper.

Review by - Yelp

David F:

Great rustic dining near Mount Pleasant, SC. Seafood selection was very good. We started with the fried clams, and then my wife had the grouper fingers while I had the broiled flounder. Food and sides were fantastic, and service was very good. We would dine here again.

Review by - Yelp

Jeff H:

The fresh and local seafood here is always amazingly delicious! The service is top notch and friendly every time. Anytime I'm out that way, I'm stopping in for something on their menu that has a lot to offer.

Review by - Yelp

Christina N:

Loved the food and the ambience. The service was efficient and fast. True southern hospitality!

Review by - Yelp

Robert W:

I'm usually a fried shrimp or fried scallops guy but today I saw the reader board special and tried it out. It was awesome charbroiled shrimp with crab meat. Over the top excellent
